short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides a way to adjust how long a Google Task takes on Google Calendar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Duration for Google Tasks: Elevate Your Task Management Experience!

Transform the way you manage tasks in Google Calendar with Duration for Google Tasks, a simple yet powerful Chrome extension that streamlines your scheduling process. This tool automatically adjusts the height of tasks in Google Calendar based on the duration specified by filling in a start and end time or by specifying the duration of the task in your task titles, ultimately providing a clearer and more intuitive overview of your schedule.

 /!\ New Update! /!\
The extension now supports adding a start and end time to your task when creating it via Google Calendar! Fill in the start and end time, and watch the magic unfold as your Task fills up the appropriate space in your calendar view. (Only available when creating a new task via Google Calendar)

/!\ Key Features  /!\
Dynamic Task Height Adjustment: Automatically resizes task blocks according to the duration specified. This visual representation makes it easier to allocate your time effectively and spot overlaps in your schedule.

Clean Calendar Display: Seamlessly hides time information (e.g., 1h, 30min) from task titles in Google Calendar while preserving it in Google Tasks. This keeps your calendar visually tidy and focused on essential details.

Responsive Design: Task heights recalibrate whenever you resize your browser window, ensuring consistent visuals across all screen sizes for an optimal user experience.

 /!\ How It Works  /!\
There are two ways to specify the duration of your task.
1. When creating a new task in the Google Calendar view, give your task a title and then click into the date-time picker area so that it reveals an end time selector. After specifying the start and end time, save your task.
2. Simply add the duration in parentheses to your task title in Google Calendar (e.g., "Create Product Requirements Doc(1.5h)"). Duration for Google Tasks will automatically adjust the height of the task block to reflect your specified duration, making your calendar more organized and visually appealing.

 /!\ Why Choose Duration for Google Tasks?  /!\
It's surprising that Google Tasks doesnâ€™t include this feature by default! I understand that effective time management is essential. Duration for Google Tasks provides a simple yet powerful solution to visualize your schedule more intuitively. Enjoy dynamic height adjustments, a clutter-free calendar, and a responsive design that enhances usability and clarity.

 /!\ Get Started! /!\
Add Duration for Google Tasks to your Chrome browser today and discover a smarter, more efficient way to manage your tasks in Google Calendar. Take control of your time and make scheduling a breeze!

Tip: You might need to refresh Google Calendar after installing the extension so that it works properly!
